40 
41 static string Sanitized(const string& path)
42 {
43  if ( path.find("%") != std::string::npos )
44  {
45  url_canon::RawCanonOutputW<256> output;
46 
47  // note that std::string .size() is the same as
48  // ePub3:string .utf8_size() defined in utfstring.h (equivalent to strlen(str.c_str()) ),
49  // but not the same as ePub3:string .size() !!
50  // WATCH OUT!
51  url_util::DecodeURLEscapeSequences(path.c_str(), static_cast<int>(path.utf8_size()), &output);
52 
53  string path_(output.data(), output.length());
54 
55  if ( path_.find('/') == 0 )
56  return path_.substr(1);
57  return path_;
58  }
59 
60  if ( path.find('/') == 0 )
61  return path.substr(1);
62  return path;
63 }
64 
78 class ByteStream
79 {
80 public:
83  typedef std::size_t size_type;
84 
87  static const size_type UnknownSize = 0;
88 
89 public:
90  ByteStream() : _eof(false), _err(0) {}
91  virtual ~ByteStream() {}
92 
93 private:
96  ByteStream(const ByteStream&) _DELETED_;
97  ByteStream(ByteStream&&) _DELETED_;
98  ByteStream& operator=(const ByteStream&) _DELETED_;
99  ByteStream& operator=(ByteStream&& o) _DELETED_;
100 
101 public:
104  virtual size_type BytesAvailable() _NOEXCEPT { return UnknownSize; }
107  virtual size_type SpaceAvailable() const _NOEXCEPT { return UnknownSize; }
108 
115  virtual bool IsOpen() const _NOEXCEPT = 0;
118  virtual void Close() = 0;
119 
126  virtual size_type ReadBytes(void* buf, size_type len) = 0;
127 
133  virtual size_type ReadAllBytes(void** buf)
134  {
135  unsigned char* resbuf = nullptr;
136  unsigned char* temp;
137  size_t resbuflen = 0;
138 
139  unsigned char rdbuf [4096] = {0};
140  size_t rdbuflen = 4096;
141  std::size_t count = this->ReadBytes(rdbuf, rdbuflen);
142  if(count)
143  {
144  resbuf = (unsigned char*)malloc(count);
145  memcpy(resbuf, rdbuf, count);
146  resbuflen = count;
147  }
148  while(count)
149  {
150  count = this->ReadBytes(rdbuf, rdbuflen);
151 
152  temp = (unsigned char*)malloc(count + resbuflen);
153  memcpy(temp, resbuf, resbuflen);
154  free(resbuf);
155  resbuf = temp;
156  memcpy(resbuf+resbuflen, rdbuf, count);
157  resbuflen += count;
158  }
159 
160  if (resbuflen > 0)
161  *buf = resbuf;
162 
163  return resbuflen;
164  }
165 
172  virtual size_type WriteBytes(const void* buf, size_type len) = 0;
173 
176  virtual bool AtEnd() const _NOEXCEPT { return _eof; }
179  virtual int Error() const _NOEXCEPT { return _err; }
180 
181 protected:
182  bool _eof;
183  int _err;
184 
185 };

192 enum class EPUB3_EXPORT AsyncEvent : uint8_t
193 {
194  None,
195  OpenCompleted,
196  HasBytesAvailable,
197  HasSpaceAvailable,
198  ErrorOccurred,
199  EndEncountered
200 };

202 class AsyncByteStream;
205 #if EPUB_COMPILER_SUPPORTS(CXX_ALIAS_TEMPLATES)
206 using StreamEventHandler = std::function<void(AsyncEvent, AsyncByteStream*)>;
207 #else
208 typedef std::function<void(AsyncEvent, AsyncByteStream*)> StreamEventHandler;
209 #endif

214 class InvalidDuplexStreamOperationError : public std::logic_error
215 {
216 public:
217  EPUB3_EXPORT InvalidDuplexStreamOperationError(const string& str) : std::logic_error(str.stl_str()) {}
218  EPUB3_EXPORT InvalidDuplexStreamOperationError(const char* str) : std::logic_error(str) {}
219  EPUB3_EXPORT ~InvalidDuplexStreamOperationError() _NOEXCEPT {}

232 class AsyncByteStream : public ByteStream
233 {
234 protected:
237  typedef uint8_t ThreadEvent;
240  static const ThreadEvent Wait = 0;
243  static const ThreadEvent ReadSpaceAvailable = 1 << 0;
246  static const ThreadEvent DataToWrite = 1 << 1;
249  static const ThreadEvent Exceptional = 1 << 2;
250 
251 public:
254  typedef std::chrono::duration<double> timeout_type;
255 
258  typedef std::function<void(RunLoopPtr, AsyncByteStream*)> StreamScheduledHandler;
259 
260 public:
265  EPUB3_EXPORT AsyncByteStream(size_type bufsize=4096);
271  EPUB3_EXPORT AsyncByteStream(StreamEventHandler handler, size_type bufsize=4096);
272  virtual ~AsyncByteStream();
273 
274 private:
275  AsyncByteStream(const AsyncByteStream&) _DELETED_;
276  AsyncByteStream(AsyncByteStream&&) _DELETED_;
277  AsyncByteStream& operator=(const AsyncByteStream&) _DELETED_;
278  AsyncByteStream& operator=(AsyncByteStream&&) _DELETED_;
279 
280 public:
283  StreamEventHandler GetEventHandler() const _NOEXCEPT { return _eventHandler; }
286  void SetEventHandler(StreamEventHandler handler) _NOEXCEPT { _eventHandler = handler; }
287 
290  AsyncEvent WaitNextEvent(timeout_type timeout=timeout_type::max());
291 
298  virtual RunLoopPtr EventTargetRunLoop() const _NOEXCEPT { return _targetRunLoop; }
301  virtual void SetTargetRunLoop(RunLoopPtr rl) _NOEXCEPT;
302 
305  StreamScheduledHandler GetScheduledHandler() const _NOEXCEPT {
306  return _streamScheduled;
307  }
310  void SetScheduledHandler(StreamScheduledHandler handler) _NOEXCEPT {
311  _streamScheduled = handler;
312  }
313 
316  virtual size_type BytesAvailable() _NOEXCEPT {
317  return (_readbuf ? _readbuf->BytesAvailable() : 0);
318  }
321  virtual size_type SpaceAvailable() const _NOEXCEPT {
322  return (_writebuf ? _writebuf->SpaceAvailable() : 0);
323  }
324 
334  virtual void Open(std::ios::openmode mode = std::ios::in|std::ios::out);
335 
338  virtual void Close();
339 
345  virtual size_type ReadBytes(void* buf, size_type len);
351  virtual size_type WriteBytes(const void* buf, size_type len);
352 
353 private:
354  size_type _bufsize;
355  shared_ptr<RingBuffer> _readbuf;
356  shared_ptr<RingBuffer> _writebuf;
357  StreamEventHandler _eventHandler;
358 
359  std::atomic_flag _closing;
360 
361  static std::thread _asyncIOThread;
362  static RunLoopPtr _asyncRunLoop;
363  static std::atomic_flag _asyncInited;
364 
365  RunLoop::EventSourcePtr _eventSource;
366  std::atomic<ThreadEvent> _event;
367  RunLoopPtr _targetRunLoop;
368  RunLoop::EventSourcePtr _eventDispatchSource;
369 
370  StreamScheduledHandler _streamScheduled;
371 
372  // The AsyncPipe class wants to assign the buffers itself.
373  friend class AsyncPipe;
374 
375 protected:
379  virtual void InitAsyncHandler();
383  virtual RunLoop::EventSourcePtr AsyncEventSource();
386  virtual RunLoop::EventSourcePtr EventDispatchSource();
390  virtual size_type read_for_async(void* buf, size_type len) = 0;
394  virtual size_type write_for_async(const void* buf, size_type len) = 0;
395 
399  void ReadyToRun();
400 };
401 
410 class AsyncPipe : public AsyncByteStream
411 {
412 public:
413  typedef std::pair<std::shared_ptr<AsyncPipe>, std::shared_ptr<AsyncPipe>> Pair;
414 
417  static Pair LinkedPair(size_type bufsize=4096);
418 
419  // The real constructor should be considered protected. Use Pair() to get a pipe.
420  AsyncPipe(size_type bufsize=4096) : AsyncByteStream(bufsize), _counterpart(), _self_closed(false), _pair_closed(false) {}
421  ~AsyncPipe();
422 
423 private:
424  AsyncPipe(const AsyncPipe&) _DELETED_;
425  AsyncPipe(AsyncPipe&&) _DELETED_;
426  AsyncPipe& operator=(const AsyncPipe&) _DELETED_;
427  AsyncPipe& operator=(AsyncPipe&&) _DELETED_;
428 
429 protected:
432  virtual void Open(std::ios::openmode mode=std::ios::in|std::ios::out) {
433  _self_closed = false;
434  AsyncByteStream::Open(mode);
435  }
436 
437 public:
438  virtual void Close() OVERRIDE;
439 
440  virtual bool IsOpen() const _NOEXCEPT OVERRIDE { return !_self_closed; }
441 
442  virtual void SetTargetRunLoop(RunLoopPtr rl) _NOEXCEPT OVERRIDE;
443 
444  virtual size_type ReadBytes(void* buf, size_type len) OVERRIDE;
445  virtual size_type WriteBytes(const void* buf, size_type len) OVERRIDE;
446 
447 protected:
448  std::weak_ptr<AsyncPipe> _counterpart;
449  bool _self_closed;
450  bool _pair_closed;
451 
452  // These do nothing here -- all the action is in this class's implementation of
453  // InitAsyncHandler()
454  virtual size_type read_for_async(void* buf, size_type len);
455  virtual size_type write_for_async(const void* buf, size_type len);
456 
457  virtual RunLoop::EventSourcePtr AsyncEventSource();
458 
459  virtual void CounterpartClosed();
460 
461 };
462 #endif /* SUPPORT_ASYNC */

469 class SeekableByteStream : public ByteStream
470 {
471 public:
472  SeekableByteStream() : ByteStream() {}
473  virtual ~SeekableByteStream() {}
474 
483  virtual size_type Seek(size_type by, std::ios::seekdir dir) { return 0; }
484 
489  virtual size_type Position() const = 0;
490 
494  virtual void Flush() {}
495 
502  virtual std::shared_ptr<SeekableByteStream> Clone() const = 0;
503 };

679 #ifdef SUPPORT_ASYNC

684 class AsyncFileByteStream : public AsyncByteStream, public FileByteStream
685 {
686 private:
687  typedef FileByteStream __F;
688  typedef AsyncByteStream __A;
689 
690 public:
693  //AsyncFileByteStream() : AsyncByteStream(), FileByteStream() {}
694 
697  AsyncFileByteStream(size_type bufsize=4096) : AsyncByteStream(bufsize), FileByteStream() {}
698 
702  AsyncFileByteStream(StreamEventHandler handler, size_type bufsize=4096) : AsyncByteStream(handler, bufsize), FileByteStream() {}
707  AsyncFileByteStream(StreamEventHandler handler, const string& path, std::ios::openmode mode = std::ios::in | std::ios::out, size_type bufsize=4096);
708  virtual ~AsyncFileByteStream() {}
709 
710 private:
711  AsyncFileByteStream(const AsyncFileByteStream&) _DELETED_;
712  AsyncFileByteStream(AsyncFileByteStream&&) _DELETED_;
713  AsyncFileByteStream& operator=(const AsyncFileByteStream&) _DELETED_;
714  AsyncFileByteStream& operator=(AsyncFileByteStream&&) _DELETED_;
715 
716 public:
717  // use the ringbuffer-based availability functions from AsyncByteStream
720  virtual size_type BytesAvailable() _NOEXCEPT { return __A::BytesAvailable(); }
723  virtual size_type SpaceAvailable() const _NOEXCEPT { return __A::SpaceAvailable(); }
724 
725  // use the file stream's IsOpen()
728  virtual bool IsOpen() const _NOEXCEPT { return __F::IsOpen(); }
729 
730  // use the async stream's read/writers
733  virtual size_type ReadBytes(void* buf, size_type len) { return __A::ReadBytes(buf, len); }
736  virtual size_type WriteBytes(const void* buf, size_type len) { return __A::WriteBytes(buf, len); }
737 
740  virtual bool Open(const string& path, std::ios::openmode mode = std::ios::in | std::ios::out);
743  virtual void Close();
744 
751  virtual std::shared_ptr<SeekableByteStream> Clone() const OVERRIDE;
752 
753 private:
754  // seeking disabled on async streams, because I value my sanity
755  virtual size_type Seek() { return 0; }
756 
757 protected:
758  virtual size_type read_for_async(void* buf, size_type len) { return __F::ReadBytes(buf, len); }
759  virtual size_type write_for_async(const void* buf, size_type len) { return __F::WriteBytes(buf, len); }
760 };
761 
766 class AsyncZipFileByteStream : public AsyncByteStream, public ZipFileByteStream
767 {
768 private:
769  typedef ZipFileByteStream __F;
770  typedef AsyncByteStream __A;
771 
772 public:
775  AsyncZipFileByteStream() : AsyncByteStream(), ZipFileByteStream() {}
776 
779  AsyncZipFileByteStream(struct zip* archive, const string& path, int zipFlags=0);
782  AsyncZipFileByteStream(StreamEventHandler handler) : AsyncByteStream(handler), ZipFileByteStream() {}
787  AsyncZipFileByteStream(StreamEventHandler handler, struct zip* archive, const string& path, int zipFlags=0) : AsyncByteStream(handler), ZipFileByteStream(archive, path, zipFlags) {}
788  virtual ~AsyncZipFileByteStream() {}
789 
790 private:
791  AsyncZipFileByteStream(const AsyncZipFileByteStream&) _DELETED_;
792  AsyncZipFileByteStream(AsyncZipFileByteStream&&) _DELETED_;
793  AsyncZipFileByteStream& operator=(const AsyncZipFileByteStream&) _DELETED_;
794  AsyncZipFileByteStream& operator=(AsyncZipFileByteStream&&) _DELETED_;
795 
796 public:
797  // use the ringbuffer-based availability functions from AsyncByteStream
800  virtual size_type BytesAvailable() _NOEXCEPT { return __A::BytesAvailable(); }
803  virtual size_type SpaceAvailable() const _NOEXCEPT { return __A::SpaceAvailable(); }
804 
805  // use the file stream's IsOpen()
808  virtual bool IsOpen() const _NOEXCEPT { return __F::IsOpen(); }
809 
810  // use the async stream's read/writers
813  virtual size_type ReadBytes(void* buf, size_type len) { return __A::ReadBytes(buf, len); }
816  virtual size_type WriteBytes(const void* buf, size_type len) { return __A::WriteBytes(buf, len); }
817 
820  virtual bool Open(struct zip* archive, const string& path, int zipFlags=0) OVERRIDE;
823  virtual void Close();
824 
831  virtual std::shared_ptr<SeekableByteStream> Clone() const OVERRIDE;
832 
833 protected:
834  virtual size_type read_for_async(void* buf, size_type len) { return __F::ReadBytes(buf, len); }
835  virtual size_type write_for_async(const void* buf, size_type len) { return __F::WriteBytes(buf, len); }
836 };
